44 inline Vec2f toVec2f( const ::POINTFX &p )
45 { return Vec2f( ( (p.x.value << 16) | p.x.fract ) / 65535.0f, ( (p.y.value << 16) | p.y.fract ) / 65535.0f ); }

48 void ComDelete( void *p );
49 
51 template<typename T>
52 inline std::shared_ptr<T> makeComShared( T *p )
53 { return std::shared_ptr<T>( p, &ComDelete ); }
54 
56 class ComOStream : public ::IStream
57 {
58  public:
59  ComOStream( cinder::OStreamRef aOStream ) : mOStream( aOStream ), _refcount( 1 ) {}
60 
61  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE QueryInterface( REFIID iid, void ** ppvObject );
62  virtual ULONG STDMETHODCALLTYPE AddRef();
63  virtual ULONG STDMETHODCALLTYPE Release();
64 
65  // ISequentialStream Interface
66  public:
67  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Read( void* pv, ULONG cb, ULONG* pcbRead ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
68  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Write( void const* pv, ULONG cb, ULONG* pcbWritten );
69  // IStream Interface
70  public:
71  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE SetSize( ULARGE_INTEGER ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
72  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE CopyTo( ::IStream*, ULARGE_INTEGER, ULARGE_INTEGER*, ULARGE_INTEGER* ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
73  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Commit( DWORD ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
74  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Revert() { return E_NOTIMPL; }
75  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE LockRegion( ULARGE_INTEGER, ULARGE_INTEGER, DWORD ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
76  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE UnlockRegion( ULARGE_INTEGER, ULARGE_INTEGER, DWORD ) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
77  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Clone(IStream **) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
78  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Seek( LARGE_INTEGER liDistanceToMove, DWORD dwOrigin, ULARGE_INTEGER* lpNewFilePointer );
79  virtual HRESULT STDMETHODCALLTYPE Stat( STATSTG* pStatstg, DWORD grfStatFlag) { return E_NOTIMPL; }
80 
81  private:
82  cinder::OStreamRef mOStream;
83  LONG _refcount;
84 };
